project_name.justification: The text repeatedly refers to the project as the 'Spring Peak project', for example: 'Headwater Gold Consolidates Spring Peak Land Position Through Private Land Agreements and Additional Claim Staking'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified at the beginning of the press release: 'Vancouver, British Columbia - The Newswire - November 1, 2023 - Headwater Gold Inc. (CSE: HWG) (OTCQB: HWAUF) (the "Company" or "Headwater") is pleased to announce...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the acquiring company is quoted in the text: 'Caleb Stroup, the President and CEO of the Company, states: “The expansion and consolidation of the Spring Peak land position is an important milestone..."'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text describes the underlying agreement for the project which is being consolidated: 'Headwater holds an option to acquire a 100% undivided interest in the Spring Peak project from Orogen Royalties...'

primary_commodity.justification: The text mentions gold exploration and results multiple times, for example: 'Recent drilling at the Disco Zone has confirmed the presence of high-grade gold mineralization, including significant intersections such as 15.92 g/t Au over 2.38 m...'

verified_article_link.justification: No specific article URL is provided in the document text, only a general company website (www.headwatergold.com).

currency.justification: The currency is explicitly stated in the terms of the private land agreements: 'By making an initial cash payment of US$10,000 on signing...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total initial cash payment is the sum of two separate payments for two lease agreements within the Spring Peak project: one for 'an initial cash payment of US$10,000 on signing' and a second for 'an initial cash payment of US$10,000 on signing'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms for the land consolidation involved cash payments for leases; no share payments were mentioned as part of the consideration.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction terms specify separate cash payments, not a single combined value for cash and shares.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction terms for the land consolidation involved cash payments for leases; no shares were issued as part of the consideration.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: The company did not pay with options; rather, it acquired an option to purchase land as part of the lease agreements.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issued share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions a planned '7,000 metres' drill program for Spring Peak, but this is described as a scheduled exploration activity funded under a separate earn-in agreement with Newmont, not a commitment as part of the consideration for the private land lease agreements.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment was mentioned as part of the consideration for the private land lease agreements.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The terms for one of the lease agreements state that the land is 'subject to a 5% NSR royalty', which is retained by the seller.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text specifies the total area of the Spring Peak project after the expansion: 'The addition of 583 new claims in this area, split between the Company’s Spring Peak (~7,835 hectares) and Lodestar (~1,620 hectares) projects...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit is provided with the area measurement: '...split between the Company’s Spring Peak (~7,835 hectares) and Lodestar (~1,620 hectares) projects...'

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain a mineral resource estimate for the Spring Peak project. It mentions historical production for the surrounding district and drill intercepts, but not a defined resource volume or mass.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company's ticker and exchange are provided in the introduction: 'Headwater Gold Inc. (CSE: HWG) (OTCQB: HWAUF)'.
